skills.name: Identify a unit of volume or capacity
Calculate the volume of a cone where the dimensions are all given in the same units
Calculate the volume of a sphere
Calculate the volume of a hemisphere

explanations.A: We need to use Pythagorasâ€™ theorem to find the height of the triangle.
explanations.B: This is the area of a triangle, but we need the perpendicular height to find the volume. How could we find this?
explanations.C: We use trigonometry if we have 2 lengths and want an angle, or we have 1 length and one angle and want another side. We don't have any angles here
explanations.D: We use trigonometry if we have 2 lengths and want an angle, or we have 1 length and one angle and want another side. We don't have any angles here
